upload.heading: Smart Import with AI
upload.description: Upload a CSV file and AI will analyze the structure and suggest automatic mapping

features.identifyColumns: Identify columns for activities, dates, and categories

features.mapActivities: Map activities to correct rings and groups
features.findPeople: Find people in data and offer team invitations

analyzing.heading: AI is analyzing your data...
analyzing.progress: This may take a few seconds

review.canChangeAfter: You can change the title after import in wheel settings

importMode.heading: Choose import method
importMode.willCreate: Import will create: {{rings}} rings, {{groups}} groups, {{activities}} activities

replace.title: Replace all data
replace.description: WARNING: All existing rings, activity groups, labels and activities will be permanently deleted. Only page structure is preserved.

append.title: Add to existing data
append.description: New rings, groups and activities are added without deleting existing data. Duplicate names may occur.

largeImport.emailNotification: We will send you an email when the import is complete. You can close this window and continue working.
largeImport.emailAddress: üìß Email will be sent to your registered address

dataPreview.title: Large dataset detected

dataPreview.allWillImport: ‚úÖ All {{total}} activities will be imported when you click "Import".
dataPreview.timeEstimate: ‚è∞ Import will take approximately {{time}}. You'll receive an email when complete.

people.heading: Found people ({{count}})
people.createTeamDescription: Invite people to collaborate on planning
people.sendInvitesEnabled: ‚úâÔ∏è Email sent directly to people with email addresses. People without email are added as pending invitations.
people.sendInvitesDisabled: üìã All people are added as pending invitations. You can add email addresses and send invitations later from team settings.

importing.heading: Importing data...
importing.emailWhenComplete: Email will be sent when import is complete.
importing.backgroundNotice: Import continues in background. You will receive a notification when complete.

complete.heading: Import complete!
complete.description: All data has been imported to your wheel
complete.teamCreated: Team "{{teamName}}" has been created with {{count}} member(s)

droppedActivities.tip: üí° Tip: Check that your CSV columns contain valid ring and group names

errors.fileRequirements: CSV file must have at least one header row and one data row

teamSuccess.emailsSent: Team created! {{sent}} email(s) sent, {{pending}} waiting for email
teamSuccess.pendingOnly: Team created! {{pending}} invitation(s) prepared (emails not sent automatically)

consolidation.groups: Activity groups: {{unique}} CSV values ‚Üí {{consolidated}} consolidated groups

validation.heading: ‚ö†Ô∏è Validation Warnings
validation.incompleteMappingTitle: ‚ùå Incomplete mapping - some activities cannot be imported
validation.incompleteMappingDescription: AI could not map all CSV values to rings and activity groups. Activities without valid mapping will be ignored.

advancedMapping.title: Advanced Mapping
advancedMapping.description: Customize AI's choice of columns, rings and groups
advancedMapping.columnSelection: Choose which columns to use for each field. Your choices are used directly during import.
advancedMapping.groupHelper: Column with categories for color coding
advancedMapping.labelsHelper: Select columns with people, status or tags

blockImportReason.heading: ‚ö†Ô∏è Why are we blocking the import?
blockImportReason.description: A year wheel with overlapping year-long bars provides no useful visualization. YearWheel is most valuable when you can see time patterns and identify conflicts. By splitting the data into multiple focused wheels you get much better overview.

advancedMapping.innerOuterTitle: Inner = main area between center and month circle, Outer = outer edge
advancedMapping.blockedTitle: Import is blocked due to unsuitable data structure

tips.heading: ‚ú® How it works
tips.changeMapping: ‚Ä¢ Change column mappings, rings or groups as needed
tips.autoSave: ‚Ä¢ All your customizations are saved automatically
tips.updateActivities: ‚Ä¢ When you change ring names, activities are automatically updated
tips.nextStep: Next step: AI will analyze your CSV file and suggest mappings automatically. You can then review and adjust the suggestions before import.

customization.heading: Customize Rings and Groups
customization.current: Your customizations: {{rings}} rings and {{groups}} activity groups.
customization.suggested: AI has suggested {{rings}} rings and {{groups}} activity groups.
customization.tooManyWarning: NOTE: {{count}} groups may be confusing - consider reducing the number.
